ExaFEL Project
About Batch processing of data Calibrating the CSPad detector with experimental data Data paths Spot discovery and refinement Installing the psana-cctbx toolchain

Getting started

  • Software installation: steps for performing the installation of the software pipeline.
  • Software build tests: In progress

Data processing steps

  1. Calibration: the necessary steps to calibrate the detector prior to analysing data.
  2. Discovery: using the initial calibration, spot finding and integration is performed to determine a crystal structure. Further refinement and calibration is performed here, until convergence has been reached.
  3. Batch: perform large scale parallel processing and refinement of the data using the optimised parameters from the previous stages.
